1.name: Dimension Reduction Dice
1.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, **1** extra Blessing(s) can be chosen, but the number of available Blessings will be reduced by **1**. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **2** time(s).

2.name: Chaos Trametes
2.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, increase the number of free Blessing resets by **1**.

3.name: Warping Compound Eye
3.desc: When choosing Blessings after winning a battle, Enhance all 1-star Blessings that appear.

4.name: Fruit of the Alien Tree
4.desc: After winning a battle, revive all downed characters in the current team and restore their HP to their Max HP. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **1** time(s).

5.name: Casket of Inaccuracy
5.desc: Gains **1**–**2** random Blessings after obtaining this Curio.

6.name: Ambergris Cheese
6.desc: After winning a battle, all allies restore HP equal to **30%** of their respective Max HP.

7.name: Fortune Glue
7.desc: When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, all Blessings that appear are guaranteed to be of 3-star rarity. This Curio will be destroyed once this effect has been triggered **1** time(s).

8.name: The Parchment That Always Eats
8.desc: Upon entering battle, all enemies receive a set amount of DMG equal to **30%** of their respective Max HP.

9.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
9.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 1-star Blessing.

10.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
10.desc: Upon your next entry into the Simulated Universe, you will get a random 2-star Blessing.

11.name: The Doctor's Robe
11.desc: Upon entering battle, regenerates Path Resonance Energy to max and increases Path Resonance DMG by **40%**.

12.name: Society Ticket
12.desc: Increases the number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle by **75%**.

13.name: Faith Bond
13.desc: Reduces the Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Enhancement, Blessing Reset, and for resetting downed characters by **30%**.

14.name: Robe of The Beauty
14.desc: Upon entering battle, increases DMG dealt by all allies by **16%** for every **100** Cosmic Fragment(s) you own.

15.name: Gold Coin of Discord
15.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **6%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

17.name: Void Wick Trimmer
17.desc: After obtaining this Curio, randomly repairs up to **2** destroyed Curio(s) and restores their remaining uses to default.

18.name: Omniscient Capsule
18.desc: You can now open your Inventory to use Consumables while in the Simulated Universe. This Curio will be destroyed after **5** Consumables have been used.

19.name: Record from Beyond the Sky
19.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies will nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after they are attacked, and cannot be debuffed for **3** turn(s).

20.name: Entropic Die
20.desc: Randomly Enhances **2** Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

21.name: Shining Trapezohedron Die
21.desc: Replaces all Curios currently in possession (including this Curio) with random Curios.

22.name: Sealing Wax of Preservation
22.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Preservation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Preservation to appear.

23.name: Sealing Wax of Elation
23.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Elation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Elation to appear.

24.name: Sealing Wax of The Hunt
24.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of The Hunt after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of The Hunt to appear.

25.name: Sealing Wax of Destruction
25.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Destruction after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Destruction to appear.

26.name: Sealing Wax of Remembrance
26.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Remembrance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Remembrance to appear.

27.name: Sealing Wax of Nihility
27.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Nihility after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Nihility to appear.

28.name: Sealing Wax of Abundance
28.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Abundance after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is a greatly increased chance for Blessings of Abundance to appear.

45.name: Corrupted Code
45.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses all their Energy when they Break enemy Weaknesses.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio regenerates characters' Energy.

46.name: Corrupted Code
46.desc: When a character Breaks enemy Weaknesses, they regenerate **40** Energy.

47.name: Odd Code
47.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a character loses **30%** of their current HP every time they use their Ultimate.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio restores HP for characters.

48.name: Odd Code
48.desc: Every time a character uses their Ultimate, they restore HP equal to **30%** of their Max HP.

49.name: Normal Code
49.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, allies take **35%** more DMG while their HP percentage is below **50%** of their Max HP.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio reduces DMG taken by allies.

50.name: Normal Code
50.desc: Characters receive **25%** less DMG while their HP percentage is below **50%** of their Max HP.

51.name: Elegant Code
51.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, a random enemy's action will be Advanced Forward by **35%** every time a character uses a Skill.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio Advances Forward characters' actions.

52.name: Elegant Code
52.desc: After a character uses a Skill, their next action will be advanced forward by **25%**.

53.name: Mysterious Code
53.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, enemies deal **35%** more DMG when another enemy unit is defeated by a character.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio increases DMG dealt by all allies.

54.name: Mysterious Code
54.desc: All allies deal **25%** more DMG after an enemy is defeated.

55.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
55.desc:
Fixing this code into a normal Curio takes 3 battles.
While the code is being fixed, each time after a character uses a Skill, they consume **1** extra Skill Points.
Once the code is fixed, this Curio makes characters' Basic ATK recover extra Skill Points.

56.name: Infinitely Recursive Code
56.desc: Recovers **1** extra Skill Point(s) when characters use Basic ATK.

57.name: Shattered Star Bait
57.desc: Increase Movement SPD by **20%** when in map. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by **10%** after they take action.

58.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer
58.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all allies' DMG by **3%** for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

59.name: Insect Web
59.desc: Upon entering battle, the character currently with the highest ATK will become Parasitized. While Parasitized, the character's ATK increases by **50%**, but will lose HP equal to **20%** of their current HP at the start of every turn. When this character is knocked down, Parasitized will be transferred to a random character.

60.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser
60.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect **5** times, this Curio will be destroyed and the amount of Cosmic Fragment(s) currently held will be doubled.

61.name: Laurel Crown of Planar Shifts
61.desc: The current exploration will not terminate if your team is defeated in battle outside of a final domain. Instead, the battle will be considered as a victory, and all characters will recover HP up to their respective Max HP. After triggering this effect **1** time(s), this Curio will be destroyed.

62.name: Space-Time Prism
62.desc: Upon entering battle, increase all ally's Eidolon Resonance level by **1**.

63.name: Cosmic Big Lotto
63.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 Curio, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and all characters losing **99%** of their current HP.

64.name: Omniscient Capsule
64.desc: Destructible objects will appear more frequently and rewards obtained from them are doubled.

65.name: Divination Cuckoo Clock
65.desc: When selecting Blessings after victory, the number of available Blessings will be reduced by **1**.

66.name: Black Forest Cuckoo Clock
66.desc: Upon entering battle, randomly increases the chance for **1** character(s) to be attacked by enemies for **5** turn(s).

67.name: Perpetual Motion Cuckoo Clock
67.desc: Upon entering a new domain, lose **5%** of all Cosmic Fragment(s) currently in possession.

68.name: Punklorde Mentality
68.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **100%** fixed chance to add to all enemies **1** Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as allies currently on the field. These Weakness(es) last(s) for **3** turn(s).

69.name: Beacon Coloring Paste
69.desc: When choosing a Blessing after winning a battle, randomly Enhance **1** Blessing(s) among the selection.

70.name: IPC Cuckoo Clock
70.desc: Increases Cosmic Fragments required to Enhance and reset Blessings by **25%**.

71.name: Mechanical Cuckoo Clock
71.desc: Upon entering battle, consume **2** Skill Point.

101.name: Triangular Drum-roll Device
101.desc: When choosing Paths for the first and second planes, you can additionally select **1** already Enhanced Blessing(s) for the corresponding Paths.

102.name: Silver Coin of Discord
102.desc: Immediately gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **50%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

103.name: Broken Cuckoo Clock
103.desc: Additionally consume a certain amount of Cosmic Fragments while you have the IPC Cuckoo Clock to obtain this Curio and immediately obtain **999** Cosmic Fragment(s).

104.name: Family Ties
104.desc: Increase all allies' DMG by **30%** for every Curio that has been destroyed.

105.name: Medal of the Gloryblood Era
105.desc: Immediately gain **1** random 3-star Blessing(s). The next time you enter an Occurrence domain, no occurrence will be triggered. This Curio will be destroyed after the effect is triggered **1** time(s).

106.name: Black Hole Trap
106.desc: You will obtain **10** Cosmic Fragments for each ally whose HP is at max when winning a battle.

107.name: Interastral Big Lotto
107.desc: After destroying destructible objects, there is a small chance of receiving 1 random Blessing, but also a small chance of destroying this Curio and causing all team members to lose all Energy and Technique Points.

108.name: Fissured Cuckoo Clock
108.desc: Reduces characters' ATK by **5%** and grants a chance of splitting into a clone (with a max of **3** concurrent clones) after winning a battle.

110.name: Typical Genius Society Gossip
110.desc: After obtaining this Curio, Cosmic Fragments obtained will increase by **100%**, but Blessings will no longer be obtained after combat

111.name: Tonic of Efficacious Chaos
111.desc: Increases DMG dealt by characters' Techniques by **200%**. Technique DMG further increases by **200%** of the Technique's respective character's Max HP.

112.name: Rubert Empire Mechanical Cogwheel
112.desc: You obtain **50** Cosmic Fragments each time you enter a domain. If the Cosmic Fragment total exceeds **500**, then the Curio will be destroyed and all Cosmic Fragments will be lost.

113.name: Cavity System Model
113.desc: Lose all currently possessed Cosmic Fragments. For every **100** Cosmic Fragments lost in this way, increases all characters' CRIT DMG by **24%**.

114.name: Tousled Detective
114.desc: When entering Combat: Swarm, Occurrence: Swarm, and Boss: Swarm domains, increases characters' DMG dealt by **8%** in the above domains.

115.name: Fool's Mask
115.desc: All Blessings in possession are swapped to random Blessings with their Enhancement levels retained, with a chance of being replaced by Blessings of higher rarity.

116.name: Vile Mechanical Satellite 900
116.desc: Item prices in Transaction domains become **70%** of what they originally were.

117.name: Spirit of the Knights of Beauty
117.desc: Gains **4** dice reroll(s) after obtaining this Curio.

118.name: Illusory Automaton
118.desc: At the start of a character's turn, they restore HP equal to **20%** of their Max HP.

119.name: A Pinch of Bearded Gunpowder
119.desc: Gains **1** cheat(s) after obtaining this Curio.

120.name: Man-Made Meteorite
120.desc: Gains **1**–**3** random Blessings for the current Path after obtaining this Curio.

121.name: Thalan Toxi-Flame
121.desc: Upon entering battle, the character with the highest ATK consumes HP equal to **24%** of their Max HP at the start of each turn. At the same time, their SPD increases by **5%**, up to **5** times.

122.name: The Pinkest Collision
122.desc: Upon entering battle, all allies' Break Effect increases by **20%** for every Blessing of a different Path possessed.

123.name: Sealing Wax of Propagation
123.desc: Randomly gains 1 Blessing of Propagation after obtaining this Curio. When choosing your Blessings after winning a battle, there is an increased chance for Blessings of Propagation to appear.

201.name: Society Ticket (Infinite)
201.desc: The number of Cosmic Fragments received after winning a battle increases by **150%**

202.name: Faith Bond (Infinite)
202.desc: The Cosmic Fragments required for Blessing Enhancement, Blessing Reset, and for resetting downed characters is reduced by **50%**

204.name: Gold Coin of Discord (Infinite)
204.desc: Upon entering a new domain, gain Cosmic Fragments equal to **12%** of the Cosmic Fragments currently in possession.

205.name: Entropic Die (Infinite)
205.desc: Randomly Enhances **5** Blessing(s) immediately after obtaining this Curio.

206.name: Obliteration Wick Trimmer (Infinite)
206.desc: Upon entering battle, all characters' DMG increase by **5%** for every destructible object that has been destroyed.

207.name: Cosmic Big Lotto (Infinite)
207.desc: This Cosmic Big Lotto will not be destroyed. After smashing destructible objects, there is a high chance of obtaining 1 Curio, but there is also a small chance that all allies will lose **50%** of their current HP and gain **50** Cosmic Fragment(s).

208.name: Omniscient Capsule (Infinite)
208.desc: On top of the original effect of the Omniscient Capsule, further increases the chance of destructible objects appearing and doubles the rewards for destroying them.

209.name: Punklorde Mentality (Infinite)
209.desc: Upon entering battle, there is a **100%** fixed chance to apply all Weakness(es) of the same Type(s) as characters currently on the field to all enemies. These Weakness(es) last(s) for **5** turn(s).

210.name: Robe of The Beauty (Infinite)
210.desc: When entering battle, increases all characters' DMG by **8%** for every **100** Cosmic Fragments that has been obtained in this run (including those that have already been spent)

211.name: Angel-type I.O.U. Dispenser (Infinite)
211.desc: Cosmic Fragments are not received upon winning battles. After triggering this effect **3** time(s), this Curio will be destroyed and you will receive Cosmic Fragments equal to **70%** of the Cosmic Fragment(s) you currently possess.

212.name: Shattered Star Bait (Infinite)
212.desc: Increase Movement SPD by **20%** when on the map. During combat, characters' actions are Advanced Forward by **10%** after they take action. When you capture a Trotter, you can additionally gain a Blessing 1 more time
